TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_bgax, title = bgax, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/bgax} }

S.FORM: bgax (ke' na Plmukan: 睪丸 ) ga qutux spiyang qaya' / qaya na hi' mlikuy. Kya kwara' bgax na mlikuy hiya'. Ana ga, ungat kwara' bgax na kneril nya'. == kinhulan s'utu biru ==
bgax (ke' na Plmokan: 睪丸 ) ga qotox spiyang qaya' / qaya na hi' mlikoy. Kya kwara' bgax na mlikoy hiya'. Ana ga, ongat kwara' bgax na kneril nya'. == kinholan s'oto biro ==
